test_message: Analyze patterns: Netflix Rs 299 on 15th every month (Jan-Mar), Swiggy orders 8 times in Feb averaging Rs 450, Amazon Prime Rs 179 charged monthly, Spotify Rs 119 monthly
expected_purpose: Identify ghost subscriptions and spending patterns

anomalies.description: High number of food delivery orders in a single month

recommendations: Review streaming subscriptions (Netflix, Amazon Prime, Spotify) to ensure all are still in active use; consider consolidating if underutilized.
Swiggy spending is significantly high; set a budget or explore meal prep/cooking to reduce frequency and cost.
Audit auto-renewals and cancel any subscriptions not needed to optimize monthly expenses.
Consider annual plans for subscriptions if you use them consistently—these often provide cost savings over monthly billing.
